syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
  "editor.fontSize": 16,
  "terminal.integrated.sendKeybindingsToShell": true,
  "editor.fontFamily": "Fira Code, Cascadia Code, JetBrains Mono, consolas, Overpass",
  "editor.fontLigatures": true,
  "files.autoSave": "onFocusChange",
  "editor.accessibilitySupport": "off",
  "C_Cpp.formatting": "vcFormat",
  "editor.inlineSuggest.enabled": true,
  "editor.inlineSuggest.showToolbar": "always",
  "github.copilot.enable": {
    "*": true,
    "yaml": false,
    "plaintext": true,
    "markdown": true
  },
  "workbench.iconTheme": "material-icon-theme",
  "workbench.editor.limit.value": 6,
  "workbench.colorTheme": "Night Owl Light (No Italics)",
  "vim.vimrc.enable": true,
  "vim.vimrc.path": "$HOME/.vscode/.vimrc",
  "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode",
  "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.windows": "Git Bash",
  "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
  "workbench.sideBar.location": "right",
  "explorer.openEditors.visible": 0,
  "workbench.settings.editor": "json",
  "breadcrumbs.enabled": false,
  "editor.formatOnPaste": true,
  "editor.formatOnSave": true,
  "editor.formatOnType": true,
  "window.restoreWindows": "none",
  "angular-schule.configUpdated": "0.5.0",
  "sonarlint.pathToNodeExecutable": "C:\\Program Files\\nodejs\\node.exe",
  "js/ts.implicitProjectConfig.checkJs": true,
  "vim.handleKeys": {
    // <C-b> and <C-f> in vim are used to scroll the page up and down, I usually use <C-d> and <C-u> for that.
    // in vscode, <C-b> used to toggle sidebar, <C-f> used to toggle search.  which is more useful than scrolling.
    "<C-b>": false,
    "<C-f>": false
  },
  "vim.useSystemClipboard": true,
  "workbench.activityBar.visible": false
}"}
